participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous, laid-back, and a little whimsical. Loves to explore new culinary experiences and has a passion for horror films.
participant_1.background: I like to try new restaurants and my favorite place to eat recently is this new sushi place that just opened up. I don't know if I enjoy programming, or if it's my only choice. I relax by watching horror movies with my favorite snacks and enjoy my tattoos. I'm not a picky eater, but I do have my preferences. I want someone who can make me laugh and share my love of pizza.

participant_2.name: Maria
participant_2.personality: Caring, creative, and family-oriented. Enjoys discovering new challenges and putting her heart into family traditions.
participant_2.background: I cannot be a florist because I would not be able to see the colors of the flowers. I am not a student, but I am always looking for new ways to challenge myself. I am a stay-at-home mom who loves to make my family proud by decorating for Christmas and other holidays. I enjoy my job as a teacher. I am Italian American.

content.text: Hey, how are you?
I am doing well! How are you today?
I'm doing pretty good, thank you. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to cook, bake, and watch horror movies. What about you?
I like to try new restaurants, go to the gym, and watch horror movies too!
What are some of your favorite horror movies?
I love the Conjuring movies, The Conjuring 2, and The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It.
I've never seen any of those movies! I'll have to check them out.
You should! They're really good. I'm also a big fan of the Saw movies.
Have you seen the new one that just came out?
No, I haven't. I'm not sure if I'm ready for that yet.
It's pretty good! It's a little different than the other ones, but it's still good.
Maybe I'll check it out when it comes out on DVD.
That's a good idea. It's a lot to take in all at once.
Yeah, I'm not sure if I'm ready to be scared in a movie theater.
I can understand that. I usually watch horror movies at home because I'm a little bit of a scaredy cat.
Me too! I'm glad I'm not the only one.
No, you're not! There are a lot of us scaredy cats out there.
I'm glad to know that. I feel like I'm the only one sometimes.
You're not! We're here for you.
